text: The men's team foil competition at the 2014 Asian Games in Goyang was held on 25 September at the Goyang Gymnasium. ==Schedule== All times are Korea Standard Time (UTC+09:00) {|class = "wikitable" style="text-align:center;" ! width=220|Date ! width=50|Time ! width=150|Event |- | rowspan=4|Thursday, 25 September 2014 || 12:30 || Round of 16 |- | 14:00 || Quarterfinals |- | 15:30 || Semifinals |- | 19:00 || bgcolor=ffffcc|Gold medal match |} ==Seeding== The teams were seeded taking into account the results achieved by competitors representing each team in the individual event. {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center" !rowspan=2 width=40|Rank !rowspan=2 width=250|Team !colspan=2|Fencer !rowspan=2 width=40|Total |- !width=40|1 !width=40|2 |- |1||align=left| ||1||3||4 |- |2||align=left| ||3||6||9 |- |2||align=left| ||2||7||9 |- |4||align=left| ||5||10||15 |- |5||align=left| ||13||19||32 |- |5||align=left| ||14||18||32 |- |5||align=left| ||12||20||32 |- |5||align=left| ||11||21||32 |- |9||align=left| ||15||22||37 |} ==Results== ==Final standing== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !width=40|Rank !width=250|Team |- | |align=left| Kenta Chida Daiki Fujino Ryo Miyake Yuki Ota |- | |align=left| Chen Haiwei Lei Sheng Li Chen Ma Jianfei |- | |align=left| Cheung Ka Long Cheung Siu Lun Nicholas Choi Yeung Chi Ka |- | |align=left| Heo Jun Kim Hyo-gon Kim Min-kyu Son Young-ki |- |5||align=left| Abdulrahman Al-Arbeed Ali Fadhel Ali Khazaal Yaser Mohammad |- |6||align=left| Kevin Jerrold Chan Joshua Lim Wu Jie Zhang Zhenggang |- |7||align=left| Sanphot Nuanphlap Nontapat Panchan Thapanun Phakungkoon Suppakorn Sritangorn |- |8||align=left| Ali Al-Asmi Mohamed Al-Tairi Nayef Hadram Khalid Meshaab |- |9||align=left| Ali Al-Binali Eisa Al-Muqabqab Mohammed Hazazi Yahya Hazazi |} ==References== *Men's Team Foil Results ==External links== *Official website Men foil
title: Fencing at the 2014 Asian Games – Men's team foil
